messages.content: ComfyUI-JDCN is a set of custom utility nodes for artists, designers and animators in ComfyUI, developed by Jerry Davos.
What types of files can be filtered using the JDCN_AnyFileList node in ComfyUI-JDCN?

The JDCN_AnyFileList node in ComfyUI-JDCN can filter files by major categories such as Images, Audios, Videos, Texts, Tensors, and Folders. It also allows filtering by specific file extensions within each category.
How does the JDCN_AnyFileListHelper node work in ComfyUI-JDCN?

The JDCN_AnyFileListHelper node in ComfyUI-JDCN is used to sort and separate file lists externally. It allows searching for files using keywords, and filtering by file type and extension, similar to the JDCN_AnyFileList node.
What is the purpose of the JDCN_AnyFileListRandom node in ComfyUI-JDCN?

The JDCN_AnyFileListRandom node in ComfyUI-JDCN is used to select elements from a file list in a random, fixed, or incremental order. The Batch_Size parameter sets the number of files to select per queue.
How can the JDCN_AnyFileSelector node be used in ComfyUI-JDCN?
The JDCN_AnyFileSelector node in ComfyUI-JDCN is used to select a single element from a given input list.
What is the function of the JDCN_SplitString node in ComfyUI-JDCN?

The JDCN_SplitString node in ComfyUI-JDCN is used to split an input string or list of strings based on a given search term. It outputs the suffix, prefix, and the location where the search term was found.
How can the JDCN_VHSFileMover node be used in ComfyUI-JDCN?

The JDCN_VHSFileMover node in ComfyUI-JDCN is used with a VHS video combine node to move the rendered file to the output location. It has an option to overwrite the file if they have the same file name.
